publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb, and are to be sold by Humphrey Moseley, at the Prince's Arms in St. Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: An expanded version of: Englands looking in and out.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb:"; the second 5 in imprint date has been crossed out and date altered to 1654.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
